# SHError.Code.signatureInvalid

**Case**

The error code to indicate that the system is unable to generate a signature from the audio.

## Declaration

```swift
case signatureInvalid
```

## Discussion

The most common cause of this error is silent audio input.

## Signature errors

- **SHError.Code.signatureDurationInvalid**: The error code to indicate that the length of the generated signature is too long or too short to make a match in the catalog.
